Text: CNG Appalachian production Forwarded by Mary Theresa FranklinHOUECT on PM Chris Germany PM To Mary Theresa CT Gloria G CT Heidi ES cc James T ES Heidi ES John M NRON Subject CNG Appalachian production Terry please call Jack Meyers at CNG Transmission and have these meters moved from CESCEM pools to Enrons pools I think all you need to do is send CNG a letter requesting Please move all meters flowing into contract GA to contract G If CNG needs meter information maybe you could send them the statement they send to Gloria I believe CESCEM has contracts Let me know if you have any questions thanks Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on PM Chris Germany PM To Mary Theresa CT James T ES John M NRON Heidi ES cc Angie NRON Molly CT Victor CT Katherine L CT Colleen CT Gloria G CT Subject CNG Appalachian production The CESCEM CNG Appalachian production is still flowing into the CESCEM gathering and transmission contracts Unless someone objects I would like to get this moved over to Enrons pool We dont need to have the gathering and transmission contracts moved over Commentsquestions

Re Citygate Production Cc get taken care of Forwarded by Mary Theresa FranklinHOUECT on AM From John M Singer ENRON PM To Chris CT cc Robert CT Wade R CT Mary Theresa CT Subject Re Citygate Production Yes CES Retail did take this gas for Jan Feb March The Canonsburg office was responsible for the noms Yes the deal needs to be input into Sitata Maybe Terry can input Wade has copies of the monthly invoices from T F Operating for all three months Deal details Volume MCF per month Price for Jan Feb Mar MCF I would not worry about the Mcf issue here Just put the volumes and price in and pay the bill John Chris CT PM To John M NRON cc Robert CT Wade R CT Mary Theresa CT Subject Citygate Production Hey John did CES take this gas for Jan Feb and Mar Wade would like to see this deal in the system Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on PM Chris Germany PM To Colleen CT Mark CT Steve CT cc John M NRON Mary Theresa CT Dick CT David CT Joan NRON Robert CT Joann NRON Wade R CT Scott CT Subject Citygate Production TF Operating has sent ENA a breach of contract letter and is requesting to terminate the contract effective Colleen I will give you a copy of the letter that was faxed to John Singer CES did a buysale behind Penn Fuel on CGAS for year starting Nov TF is the supplier and Glenn Gary was the market The market went away effective and ENAEES has no other market behind this part of Penn Fuels system We checked with the Penn Fuel asset management deal and according to Penn Fuel they cant take it either TF is looking for their payment for Jan Feb and Mar and TF will waive any and all cover cost that ENA would otherwise be liable for subsequent to April John Singer wants to make sure we address the hedges in the books will this need to be included in the CES trueup Also John wants to know if he should sign the letter Colleen I told John you would anwser that question

Re CNR Contracts Forwarded by Mary Theresa FranklinHOUECT on PM MARY THERESA FRANKLIN PM To Katherine L CT cc Robert CT Carrie ct Brenda H CT Subject Re CNR Contracts We have had an unexpected death in my family requiring me to be out of the office the rest of the week I am sorry the timing is so bad I will contact Robert first thing next week and we can workout a game plan going forward Thanks for your patience Forwarded by Mary Theresa FranklinHOUECT on PM To Mary Theresa CT cc Robert CT Joan NRON Carrie ct Brenda H CT Subject Re CNR Contracts The contracts are the transportation agreements on CNR Robert sat with Chris Germany yesterday and to our knowledge these gathering contracts have never been set up in our systems Ill be in meetings until so please feel free to talk to Robert Allwein down on Actually I think it would be a great idea to spend a few minutes talking about this to get on the same page before anyone gets too far into the process and we discover that rework is being done MARY THERESA FRANKLIN PM To Katherine L CT cc Carrie ct Brenda H CT Subject Re CNR Contracts I just meet with Gloria to decipher what the status is on all her Emails Shes identified all the remaining rate changes needed for todays payments the transport contracts needed to be setup Sitara numbers needed for contracts already set up and the meters needing to be linked to transport contracts Im still fuzzy on this whole process and am not sure what Robert Allweins or contracts relate to are these purchase contracts Ill be up shortly working with Brenda lets see if a meeting would be good

Dominion Contracts Cc Forwarded by Mary Theresa FranklinHOUECT on AM Chris Germany AM To Mary Theresa CT cc Subject Dominion Contracts Do we still have any activity or imbalances on the following Columbia Energy Services contracts k Ga ga ga g ta ta t t

Action needed for Wade to process the Phillips Payments Cc how things look now This is what need to happen ANGIE Please TB CNG meter in Jun with zero volumes for deals and Please notify Sheri X when you are done SHERI After Angie is done please actualize CNG meter as shown above When you are done please notify Wade X If you have any question or problems please call me X

Action needed for Wade to process the Phillips Payments Cc how things look now This is what need to happen ANGIE Please TB CNG meter in Jun with zero volumes for deals and Please notify Sheri X when you are done SHERI After Angie is done please actualize CNG meter as shown above When you are done please notify Wade X If you have any question or problems please call me X
